TopicTitle: Do you ever felt that watching and gathering Kerbals mods is more important first ?

Articles.Content:
Do you ever felt that watching and gathering Kerbals mods is more important first ? Maybe i drag along the misinformation regarding Kerbal Space Program combined with the gathering of mods :

And i still have to check a bit 0.16, 0.25 and 0.90. 1.0.2 and 1.0.4 was not even started. I'm pretty late, no ?
First rule of mod club: Never update 'til the mods are up to date.

First rule of mod club: Never update 'til the mods are up to date.

Its why I keep a backup of 1.04 on my second HDD, just in case I get home, launch steam and it updates KSP

Its why I keep a backup of 1.04 on my second HDD, just in case I get home, launch steam and it updates KSP

I have one of those too, only I call it my main game
